mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.title, b.view_count, b.created_date, b.category, m.member_no, m.name from ps_board b inner join ps_member m on b.writer=m.member_no where case when #{searchKeyword} is null or #{searchKeyword} = '' then category=#{category} else category=#{category} and case when #{searchType} = 'title' then title like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') else content like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') end end order by board_no desc

select b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.created_date, b.category, m.member_no, m.name from ps_board b inner join ps_member m on b.writer=m.member_no where category=#{categoryNo} and board_no=#{boardNo}
